name: Boxboy's Wrestling Challenge
description:
Survive the endless onslaught of blood-thirsty wrestlers as they unfairly team up to try and take you down. Eliminate the opposition by tossing them over the top rope, and avoid being bullied into submission.

Note: Created as part of Ludum Dare 51, submitted for the Compo category. The theme being "Every 10 Seconds". The project was developed over a weekend, so hope it doesn't stink too bad! Enjoy.
